playhead.title: Playhead
playhead.description: If the content is live, the playhead must be the current second of the day, 0 <= playhead < 86400. If the content is recorded, the playhead must be the current second of content, 0 <= playhead < content length.

sessionId.title: Media Session ID
sessionId.description: Identifies an instance of a content stream unique to an individual playback.
